knimeNode.name: Write WKT to GML
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes WKT spatial data as GML

fullDescription.intro:
Writes WKT geometries into Geography Markup Language (GML) format.
The actual processing is done by the efficient geotools library.
fullDescription.option: File to create or erase. If the filename ends with kmz, the resulting file will be compressed.
The version of the GML format to use.
